mapper.select: select g.id, g.sn, g.group_name, g.description, g.created_at, g.updated_at, u.username, d.name, s.name from groups g left join itsnow_msc.users u on u.username = g.username left join staffs stf on stf.user_id = u.id left join department d on d.id = stf.dept_id left join site s on s.id = stf.site_id where g.group_name like #{keyword} order by ${sort} ${dir} limit #{offset}, #{size}
